text: - [iA Writer]({{$url0}}): A Markdown syntax editor praised for its simplicity, ideal for long-form writing but lacks note organization and related features.
- [Paper]({{$url0}}): A Markdown editor offering a better writing experience than iA Writer, suitable for quick notes but has some bugs and limitations.
- [Obsidian]({{$url0}}): Used primarily for organizing content, allows sharing notes online as a static website when paired with [Vitepress]({{$url1}}).
- [Notion]({{$url0}}): Collaborates with others to create, share content or leverage automation; offers an API for integration with services.
- [Linear]({{$url0}}): Task management tool used for organizing work with API connectivity for automation, customizable views, and keyboard shortcuts.
- [Todoist]({{$url0}}): Task management tool offering API for data management, clear GUI, and keyboard shortcuts.
- [Google Workspace]({{$url0}}): Provides Gmail with automation capabilities through advanced filters and integrations with tools like Make.com.
- [Superhuman]({{$url0}}): Email client used with Gmail, valued for keyboard shortcuts and user experience despite high price.
- [Make.com]({{$url0}}): Automation platform used to set up scenarios handling emails, saving attachments to Google Drive, adding tasks to Linear.
- [Zencal]({{$url0}}): Scheduling tool for booking meeting slots with automations.
- [Notion Calendar]({{$url0}}): Calendar app within Notion, resembling Superhuman with keyboard shortcuts and minimalist interface.
- [Arc Browser]({{$url0}}): Main browser used with focus on basic functionalities and Command Bar.
- [Feedly]({{$url0}}): Tool for staying updated and monitoring news, integrated with Make.com automations for saving and organizing links.
- [Product Hunt]({{$url0}}): Source for discovering new products and tools.
- [daily.dev]({{$url0}}): Platform for staying updated with developer news.
- [Indie Hackers]({{$url0}}): Community platform for indie developers and hackers.
- [HackerNews]({{$url0}}): News aggregator for technology and startup news.
- [Figma]({{$url0}}): UI and promotional material design tool, excels with components and auto-layout.
- [Adobe Photoshop Beta]({{$url0}}): Image editing tool with Generative AI features.
- [Midjourney]({{$url0}}): Generative AI tool used for creating graphics and asset variants.
- [Adobe Firefly]({{$url0}}): Tool for editing assets generated in Midjourney.
- [Webflow]({{$url0}}): Graphic editor for creating designs based on templates.
- [HTMLCSSToImage]({{$url0}}): Tool for automatic generation of graphics from HTML templates.
- [Stable Diffusion 3]({{$url0}}): Generative AI tool used alongside Midjourney for generating graphics.
- [IntelliJ IDEA]({{$url0}}): Main code editor, works well with TypeScript and Rust, highly customizable with keyboard shortcuts.
- [Supermaven]({{$url0}}): Alternative to GitHub Copilot, intelligent code suggestion tool.
- [iTerm]({{$url0}}): Preferred terminal for simplicity and performance.
- [TablePlus]({{$url0}}): Database client for macOS.
- [Raycast]({{$url0}}): Application used for search menu items and accessing functions.
- [GitHub Actions]({{$url0}}): Tool for automating code deployment.
- [Shortcuts]({{$url0}}): Automation tool for macros.
- [Keyboard Maestro]({{$url0}}): Application for creating macros.
- [Better Touch Tool]({{$url0}}): Tool for trackpad gestures and macros.
- [Goodreads]({{$url0}}): Platform for logging book titles and sharing notes.
- [Amazon Kindle]({{$url0}}): App for reading e-books.
- [Audible]({{$url0}}): Audiobooks platform.
- [PlayStation 5]({{$url0}}): Gaming console.
- [Nvidia GeForce Now]({{$url0}}): Game streaming service.
- [Steam Deck]({{$url0}}): Portable gaming device.
- [Nintendo Switch]({{$url0}}): Gaming console.
- [Spotify]({{$url0}}): Music streaming service.
- [Endel]({{$url0}}): Focus music app.
- [Vitepress]({{$url0}}): Static site generator used with Obsidian.
- [Algolia]({{$url0}}): Search engine linked with Feedly integrations.
- [Qdrant]({{$url0}}): Search engine linked with Feedly integrations.
- [ray.so]({{$url0}}): Tool for generating code snippets via Puppeteer automation macro.
- [Xnapper]({{$url0}}): Tool for taking screenshots.
- [Dropshare]({{$url0}}): Tool for sharing images and files.
- [DigitalOcean]({{$url0}}): Hosting provider for images and files.
- [TinyPNG]({{$url0}}): Tool for optimizing images.
- [Paste]({{$url0}}): Clipboard manager.
